Legal risks stemming from data privacy regulations and securities practices

Dependence on renewable energy targets amid ESG scrutiny
social_issues: Compliance with varying data privacy regulations across global operations
Potential operational challenges due to regulatory requirements
governance_issues: Legal risks related to securities and employment practices
Complexities in managing Scope 3 emissions and vendor accountability
